name: Rakshasa, Myrmidon
damage_vulnerabilities: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Forked Scimitar or Arcane Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Forked Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage + 5 (2d4) force. Instead of dealing damage myrmidon can disarm a target wielding a weapon. Target must make DC 12 Str save or its weapon lands in a random space within 10 ft. of the target.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (4d4+2) force.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 12) no material components: At will: detect thoughts disguise self2/day: expeditious retreat

special_abilities.name: Arcane Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon weapon deals extra 2d4 force (included below).

special_abilities.name: Dedicated Warrior
special_abilities.desc: The myrmidon has advantage on saves vs. being charmed and frightened.

special_abilities.name: Limited Magic Immunity
special_abilities.desc: Can't be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. Has advantage on saves vs. all other spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Tiger Tag Team
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attack rolls vs. a creature if 1+ friendly rakshasa is within 5 ft. of creature and that rakshasa isn't incapacitated.
